# bloom #

R language bindings for dablooms.

### Example usage

```{r}
library(bloom)
bloom <- new(bloom::bloom, 1000, .05, "/tmp/bloom.bin")
bloom$add("foo", 2)
bloom$check("bar")
bloom$check("foo")
bloom$remove("foo", 2)
bloom$check("foo")
```
